prompts.style_base: Preserve geometry and perspective. Apply one coherent noir drawing hand. No text, no logos, no watermark.
prompts.time_day: Daylight scene with clear readability and stable contrast family.
prompts.time_night: Night scene with controlled deep shadows, no topology changes.
prompts.weather_clear: Dry clear atmosphere. No rain streaks, no snow particles, no diagonal sky hatching.
prompts.weather_rain: Visible wet surfaces, puddles, and reflection cues; no style drift.
